name: X7 Blocks - Merge Puzzle
description:
X7 Blocks: Minimalistic & Elegantly designed Game which lets you think out of the box and sharpen your mind.

The goal is to merge the same numbered blocks so they merge into higher numbers.

You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.
Once you start playing it, you will absolutely get addicted to this puzzle game.

HOW TO PLAY
• Match 3 of the same numbered blocks onto the board!
• The blocks can rotate.
• Merge 3 same numbers to form a higher number.
• Make 7 the ultimate goal. When two 7 are merged, they become powerful bombs!

GAME FEATURES
- Minimalistic & Elegantly designed Game
- Smooth & simple controls
- Power-ups to help you if you are stuck
- Easy to learn and play
- Automatic save game
- No time limits
- Play anywhere, at any time by taking 'X7 Blocks' with you on the metro or when at work
